data.title: Black Hawk Exploration To Launch New Updated Website To Include Wholly Owned Subsidiaries Blue Lithium Energy's Clayton Valley Lithium Drill Program and Golden Black Hawk's Dun Glen Gold Exploration P
data.meta_description: /PRNewswire-FirstCall/ -- Black Hawk Exploration, Inc. (OTC Bulletin Board: BHWX) ("Black Hawk") announces it will be launching of new updated website in early...
data.text:
FOX ISLAND, Wash., Jan 25 /PRNewswire-FirstCall/ -- Black Hawk Exploration, Inc. (OTC Bulletin Board: BHWX) ("Black Hawk") announces it will be launching of new updated website in early February 2010. Black Hawk Exploration has engaged Dragonwyck Web Design LLC to completely redesign and expand a shareholder, investment community and interested visitor platform that can be easily updated by management to allow Black Hawk Exploration and its wholly owned subsidiaries Blue Lithium Energy and Golden Black Hawk to provide a current, clear and informative venue of past accomplishments, current information and future plans for our "Visitors". "...Our new Website will provide for real time communication and feedback as well as a window into the history and growth of BHWX," stated CEO, Kevin M Murphy. The Black Hawk Exploration web address will remain the same,

www.BlackHawkExploration.com

About Dragonwyck Web Design LLC

Dragonwyck Web Design LLC was founded in over 11 years ago by John Ohlson. With over ten years of experience in database and software application design, Dragonwyck's development staff brings a wealth of experience and technical expertise to the new Black Hawk Exploration website. Dragonwyck boasts a diverse expertise which includes government sector projects, dynamic content database driven websites, e-commerce websites, new technology and mobile & wireless computing.

Headed by Dragonwyck President and CEO John Ohlson, management has lectured and authored numerous conference papers on application development, database design, software quality assurance, web design and wireless computing. Dragonwyck clients comprise a multi discipline portfolio ranging from biometric security consultants, to online e-commerce merchants, non-profit and community groups and more.

"Websites that Work" is the Dragonwyck motto - anyone can build a website that looks pretty, but the true test of a great web design firm is the ability to create great looking websites that have the right ingredients.

About Black Hawk Exploration Inc.:

Black Hawk is a diversified metals and energy exploration company with its current focus on lithium exploration through its wholly owned subsidiary Blue Lithium and Gold discovery through its wholly owned Golden Black Hawk, Dun Glen holdings. Black Hawk is committed to an aggressive program of value added property acquisition, project generation, asset diversity and building Shareholder value.

"Safe Harbor" Statement: Under The Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995: The statements in the press release that relate to the company's expectations with regard to the future impact on the company's results from new products in development are forward-looking statements, within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995.

Certain oral statements made by management from time to time and certain statements contained in press releases and periodic reports issued by Black Hawk (the "Company"), as well as those contained herein, that are not historical facts are "forward-looking statements" within the meaning of Section 21E of the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934 and, because such statements involve risks and uncertainties, actual results may differ materially from those expressed or implied by such forward-looking statements.

SOURCE Black Hawk Exploration, Inc.
